mapper.select: SELECT city_route_no as 'cityRouteNo', plan_no as 'planNo', city_route_date as 'cityRouteDate', city_route_departure_city as 'cityRouteDepartureCity', city_route_arrival_city as 'cityRouteArrivalCity', city_route_departure_time as 'cityRouteDepartureTime', city_route_arrival_time as 'cityRouteArrivalTime' FROM city_route WHERE city_route_no = #{cityRouteNo};
